title: Samsung opens pre-orders for its first OLED smart TV
content:
Most of Samsung’s smart TVs use QLED (quantum dot light-emitting diode) panels, which are similar to regular LED screens, but with a special layer to improve colors and contrast. However, the company is now trying something different: an OLED smart TV, intended to compete with LG’s lineup of OLED TVs. Samsung’s first OLED 4K TV,

The post Samsung opens pre-orders for its first OLED smart TV appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has revealed its first OLED TV, the S95B, boasting deep blacks, 120Hz support for gaming, and more.
